actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department; OMB.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging, Family and Human Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Aging, Family, and Human Services

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to submit an annual report on child day care services.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to submit an annual report, beginning in calendar year 1982, to the Congress concerning the availability and quality of child day care services provided in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to submit an annual report on child day care services.
